div.p: ( a, c) Maps of skill score (SS) relative to a reference forecast (CRPSS) of WBGT shade at lead times 12–18 days (Week 2 (W2), see details in Section 2.3.3), with respect to the raw forecasts (empirical quantile mapping (EQM) with respect to RAW) and to the climatology forecast (EQM with respect to CLIM). ( b, d) Weekly CRPSS of WBGT shade. Each box represents the CRPSS values across European stations. The box for W2 (12–18 days) corresponds to the values displayed in the maps above.
